function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited availability of microdata for 2020","Impact":"Inability to use 2020 data for analysis may limit the accuracy of the findings","Mitigation":"Use alternative data sources or statistical techniques to account for missing data","Technologies":"Statistical imputation or prediction models","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Inability to identify gender and age of victims in state-level data","Impact":"Inability to assess impact by gender and age in the analysis","Mitigation":"Use national-level data or conduct additional surveys to gather this information","Technologies":"Surveys, data collection tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Rise in calls to helpline starting in April 2020","Impact":"May indicate an increase in violence or need for support, affecting the analysis","Mitigation":"Consider the impact of this rise in the interpretation of results, conduct additional analysis on the nature of calls","Technologies":"Natural language processing, sentiment analysis","People":"Data analysts, social workers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
